description.english: Spot all the landmarks using the telescopes.
description.german: Sieh dir alle Landmarken mit den Teleskopen an
description.italian: Guarda tutti i punti di riferimento utilizzando i telescopi
description.spanish: Observa todos los puntos de referencia usando los telescopios
description.schinese: 使用望远镜看到所有地标
description.tchinese: 用望遠鏡看見所有地標
description.japanese: 望遠鏡を使ってすべてのランドマークを見る。
description.polish: Zobacz wszystkie regiony za pomocą teleskopów
description.brazilian: Ver todas as regiões usando telescópios
description.french: Trouver tous les points de repère à l'aide des télescopes.

description.english: Gather all the intel from El Condor.
description.german: Sammle alle Informationen von El Condor
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le informazioni a El Condor
description.spanish: Recopila toda la información de El Cóndor

description.tchinese: 解鎖禿鷹村的所有情報
description.japanese: エルコンドルですべての情報を得る。
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie informacje w El Condor
description.brazilian: Conseguir todas as informações em El Condor
description.french: Rassembler toutes les infos d'El Condor.

description.english: Gather all the intel from Lago Village.
description.german: Sammle alle Informationen aus dem Dorf Lago
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le informazioni al villaggio di Lago
description.spanish: Recopila  toda la información de Aldea del Lago
description.schinese: 获取拉格村的所有关键情报
description.tchinese: 解鎖湖泊村的所有情報
description.japanese: ラゴ村ですべての情報を得る。
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie informacje w Vila Lago
description.brazilian: Conseguir todas as informações na Vila Lago
description.french: Rassembler toutes les infos du village de Lago.

description.english: Gather all the intel from the Silent City.
description.german: Sammle alle Informationen aus der Stillen Stadt
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le informazioni a Città Silente
description.spanish: Recopila toda la información de la ciudad silenciosa
description.schinese: 获取寂静之城的所有关键情报
description.tchinese: 解鎖寂靜之城的所有情報
description.japanese: 沈黙の都市ですべての情報を得る。
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie informacje w Milczącym Mieście
description.brazilian: Conseguir todas as informações na Cidade Silenciosa
description.french: Rassembler toutes les infos de la ville silencieuse.

description.english: Gather all the intel from the Last City.
description.german: Sammle alle Informationen aus dem letzten Dorf
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le informazioni nell'ultimo villaggio
description.spanish: Recopila toda la información de la última aldea
description.schinese: 获取最后村落的所有关键情报
description.tchinese: 解鎖最後的村莊的所有情報
description.japanese: 最後の都市ですべての情報を得る。
description.polish: Zdobądź wszystkie informacje w Ostatniej Wiosce
description.brazilian: Conseguir todas as informações na Última Vila
description.french: Rassembler toutes les infos de la ville ultime.

description.english: Give the perfect tulip to Koin.
description.german: Gib Koin die perfekte Tulpe
description.italian: Dar il tulipano perfetto a Koin
description.spanish: Dale el tulipán perfecto a Koin
description.schinese: 将完美郁金香交给科恩
description.tchinese: 贈與科茵完美的鬱金香
description.japanese: 完璧なチューリップをコインに渡す。
description.brazilian: Dar a tulipa perfeita para o Koin
description.french: Donner la tulipe parfaite à Kion.

description.english: See all the giants in the game.
description.german: Sieh alle Riesen im Spiel
description.italian: Osserva tutti i giganti nel gioco
description.spanish: Contempla todos los gigantes del juego
description.schinese: 见识过游戏中的所有巨人
description.tchinese: 發現所有巨人
description.japanese: ゲームの中のすべての巨人を見る。
description.brazilian: Ver todos os gigantes do jogo
description.french: Voir tous les géants du jeu.

description.english: Read all the journal pages in the Silent City.
description.german: Lies alle Tagebuchseiten in der Stillen Stadt
description.italian: Leggi tutte le pagine del diario a Città Silente
description.koreana: 고요한 도시에서 일지 페이지를 모두 읽으세요.
description.spanish: Lee todas las páginas del diario en la ciudad silenciosa
description.schinese: 在寂静之城读过所有日志页面
description.tchinese: 閱讀寂靜之城內的所有日記
description.japanese: 沈黙の都市でジャーナルのすべてのページを読む。
description.polish: Przeczytaj wszystkie strony w Milczącym Mieście
description.brazilian: Ler todas as páginas na Cidade Silenciosa
description.french: Lire toutes les pages du journal dans la ville silencieuse.

description.english: Dive into the lake at the end of Scene 14.
description.german: Tauche am Ende von Szene 14 in den See
description.italian: Immergiti nel lago alla fine della Scena 14
description.spanish: Zambúllete en el lago al final de la escena 14
description.schinese: 在第14幕的结尾跳入湖中
description.tchinese: 在第十四幕結尾跳入湖中
description.japanese: シーン14の終わりで、湖に飛び込む。
description.polish: Zanurkuj w jeziorze na końcu Sceny 14
description.brazilian: Mergulhar no lago no final da Cena 14
description.french: Plonger dans le lac à la fin de la scène 14.

description.english: Keep your boots dry in Scene 3.
description.german: Halte deine Stiefel in Szene 03 trocken
description.italian: Proteggi gli stivali nella Scena 03
description.spanish: Mantén tus botas secas en la escena 03
description.schinese: 在第3幕中不湿脚
description.tchinese: 在第三幕保持靴子乾燥
description.japanese: シーン3でブーツを濡らさない。
description.brazilian: Mantenha suas botas secas na Cena 03
description.french: Garder vos bottes sèches lors de la scène 3.

description.english: Meet Sence.
description.german: Triff Sence
description.italian: Incontra Sence
description.spanish: Encuentra a Sence
description.schinese: 遇见森斯
description.tchinese: 結識明理
description.japanese: センスと出会う。
description.brazilian: Conhecer a Sence
description.french: Rencontrer Sence.

description.english: Meet Serpi.
description.german: Triff Serpi
description.italian: Incontra Serpi
description.spanish: Encuentra a Serpi
description.schinese: 遇见斯尔皮
description.tchinese: 結識阿冉
description.japanese: セルピと出会う。
description.brazilian: Conhecer o Serpi
description.french: Rencontrer Serpi.

description.english: Speak to Sir Henry Hills.
description.german: Sprich mit Sir Henry Hills
description.italian: Parla con Sir Henry Hills
description.spanish: Habla con sir Henry Hills
description.schinese: 与亨利·希尔斯爵士对话
description.tchinese: 與亨利·希爾斯爵士交談
description.japanese: ヘンリー・ヒルズ卿と話す。
description.brazilian: Falar com Sir Henry Hills
description.french: Parler à Sir Henry Hills.

description.english: Interact with the obsolete technology in Scene 9.
description.german: Interagiere mit einer veralteten Technologie in Szene 09
description.italian: Interagisci con una tecnologia obsoleta nella Scena 09
description.spanish: Interactúa con una tecnología obsoleta en la Escena 09
description.schinese: 在第9幕中与过时工艺品互动
description.tchinese: 在第九幕與「時代的眼淚」互動
description.japanese: シーン9で、時代遅れのテクノロジーと交流する。
description.brazilian: Interagir com uma tecnologia obsoleta na Cena 19
description.french: Interagir avec la technologie obsolète lors de la scène 9.

description.english: Check all the paintings inside the central temple in Scene 13.
description.german: Sieh dir alle Gemälde im Inneren des zentralen Tempels in Szene 13 an
description.italian: Esamina tutti i dipinti all'interno del tempio centrale nella Scena 13
description.koreana: 장면 13에서 중앙 사원 안에 있는 그림을 모두 살펴보세요.
description.spanish: Revisa todos los dibujos que hay dentro del templo central en la escena 13
description.schinese: 在第13幕中检查中央神庙的所有画作
description.tchinese: 在第十三幕調查中央神殿的所有壁畫
description.japanese: シーン13で、中央神殿の中の絵をすべて調べる。
description.polish: Sprawdź wszystkie obrazy wewnątrz głównego sanktuarium w Scenie 13
description.turkish: 13. Sahnede ana tapınakta tüm resimleri kontrol et
description.brazilian: Checar todas as pinturas dentro do templo central na Cena 13
description.french: Consulter toutes les peintures du temple central lors de la scène 13.

displayName.german: Das ist der Weg des Backpackers!
displayName.japanese: これがバックパッカーの道！
displayName.french: Ça, c'est de la vraie randonnée !

description.english: Try to leave El Condor without planning.
description.german: Versuche, El Condor ohne Planung zu verlassen
description.italian: Cerca di lasciare El Condor senza pianificare

description.schinese: 不做任何计划就试着离开埃尔孔多
description.tchinese: 在不做計劃的條件下離開禿鷹村
description.japanese: 計画なしで、エルコンドルから出ようとする。
description.polish: Spróbuj wydostać się z El Condor bez planu
description.brazilian: Tentar sair de El Condor sem se planejar
description.french: Essayer de partir de El Condor sans planification.

description.english: See all the Sacred Places of Old.

description.japanese: 旅人の石を10見る。
description.brazilian: Ver 10 Pedras da Viajante
description.french: Voir 10 pierres de voyageur.

description.tchinese: 發現所有旅人石
description.japanese: レア旅人石をすべて見る。
description.brazilian: Ver todas as Pedras da Viajante raras
description.french: Voir toutes les pierres rares de voyageur.

description.english: Play hide-and-seek with Loij in Scene 13.
description.german: Verstecken spielen mit Loij in Szene 13
description.italian: Gioca a nascondino con Loij nella Scena 13
description.spanish: Juega al escondite con Loiji en la escena 13

description.tchinese: 在第十三幕和洛伊玩捉迷藏

displayName.japanese: アルバトロズのいびき

description.english: Reach Albatroz in Scene 16 or 17 before waking him up.
description.german: Erreiche Albatroz in Szene 16 oder Szene 17, bevor du ihn aufweckst
description.italian: Raggiungi l'Albatroz nella scena 16 o nella scena 17 prima di svegliarlo
description.koreana: 장면 16 또는 17에서 알바트로즈가 깨기 전에 접근하세요.
description.spanish: AAlcanza al Albatroz en la escena 16 o la escena 17 antes de despertar
description.schinese: 在第16或第17幕中，赶在阿邦卓兹醒来前顺利抵达它身边
description.tchinese: 第十六幕或第十七幕中，在信天翁山甦醒前抵達
description.japanese: アルバトロズを起こす前に、シーン16またはシーン17でアルバトロズに到着する。
description.polish: Dotrzyj do Albatroza w Scenie 16 lub 17 przed jego przebudzeniem
description.turkish: Albatroz'a 16. veya 17. sahnede uyanmadan önce ulaş
description.brazilian: Chegar no Albatroz na Cena 16 ou Cena 17 antes dele acordar
description.french: Atteindre Albatroz lors de la scène 16 ou 17 avant de le réveiller.
